Subject: Looking for a way to uninstall EPP via a script in Mosyle
Description:
I reached out to EndpointProtector support a while back and was able to get a script sent over that I could use in Mosyle to push out the install to all of my endpoints, and it worked great.  

Do you happen to have something similar for uninstalling EPP?  I found the remove-epp UNIX executable file in the install TAR package, but hoping to not have to drop the file on each machine and run it manually.  

Thanks for any advice you can give!
What_We_Know__c:
3/6/2025
- Customer requested a uninstall script for MacOS
- Sent customer email informing the customer that the "remove-epp" script  is apart of the installation package and can be used on MDM 
- Sent customer follow up email asking if customer needs further assistance
Solution_Comment__c: Customer received the epp uninstall script and has requested to close case
